document.full_text: the tunisian government confirmed the date of july 24 for a first election since the overthrow of former president zine al-abidine ben ali in january, after opposition parties protested against a proposed delay.
document.title: tunisian government confirms july 24 election date
lines_and_colors: the tunisian government confirmed the date of july 24 for a first election since the overthrow of former president zine al-abidine ben ali in january, after opposition parties protested against a proposed delay.
